name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: A fresh mix of lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and grilled chicken with your choice of dressing.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Crispy whole grain bread topped with smashed avocado, a touch of lime, and a sprinkle of salt.

name: Oatmeal with Fresh Berries
description: Warm oatmeal served with fresh strawberries, blueberries, a drizzle of honey, and a dash of cinnamon.

name: Turkey Club Sandwich
description: A classic turkey club sandwich with bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo, served on toasted bread.

name: Chicken Quesadilla
description: A delicious flour tortilla stuffed with grilled chicken, a three cheese blend, rice, and a red salsa.

name: Grilled Salmon with Asparagus
description: Freshly grilled salmon served with a side of roasted asparagus and a lemon butter sauce.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
description: Tender slices of beef stir-fried with a mix of bell peppers, broccoli, and onions in a savory sauce.

name: Caprese Sandwich
description: A delightful sandwich filled with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and aromatic basil leaves, drizzled with balsamic glaze and served on a freshly baked ciabatta roll.
